author: JanFSchulte
body: The L1 muon prefiring weights have to be updated following a fix for an inconsistency in the measurement, which lead to an overestimated prefiring rate to be used in the correction. See https://cernbox.cern.ch/index.php/s/K1dfiFEiApKjkRY for details.
title: Update L1 prefiring weights for muons
